.. _install_requirements:

============
Requirements
============
* > 10 GB RAM (Development)
* > 100GB Disk Space (Development)
* Docker <https://www.docker.com>
* Docker Compose <https://docs.docker.com/compose/>

Production
----------
* `Nginx <https://www.nginx.com>`_
* `Apache Cassandra <http://cassandra.apache.org>`_ >= 3.11.2
* `RabbitMQ <https://www.rabbitmq.com>`_ 
* `OpenSSL <https://www.openssl.org>`_
* `Elastic Search <https://www.elastic.co/products/elasticsearch>`_ >= 5.6

Optional Components
-------------------
* `MongoDB <https://www.mongodb.com>`_ *(for boost)*
* `Neo4j <https://neo4j.com>`_ 2.2 or greater *(for discovery)*
* `Redis <https://redis.io>`_ *(for pubsub, live and caching)*
